Class SimpleRecordReader

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader<Key,Value>
      org.huahinframework.core.lib.input.SimpleRecordReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MasterTextRecordReader, SimpleTextRecordReader, ValueTextRecordReader
public abstract class SimpleRecordReader
extends RecordReader<Key,Value>

Treats keys as offset in file and value as line.
